scripts.build:copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/pkg && if [ -d src/rust/pkg ]; then cp -R src/rust/pkg/* dist/pkg/; fi
scripts.build:obfuscate: for file in dist/*.js; do javascript-obfuscator "$file" --output dist-obf/"$(basename "$file")" --compact true --target browser --control-flow-flattening false --dead-code-injection true --dead-code-injection-threshold 0.2 --identifier-names-generator mangled-shuffled --numbers-to-expressions false --self-defending true --simplify false --split-strings false --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.5 --string-array-encoding base64 --string-array-index-shift true --string-array-rotate false --string-array-shuffle false --string-array-wrappers-count 1 --string-array-wrappers-type variable --transform-object-keys false --disable-console-output false --log false; done
scripts.build: (command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 && npm run build:wasm) || echo 'wasm-pack not found, skipping wasm build'; npm run build:bundle && npm run build:copy-wasm && npm run build:obfuscate
